Title: Docker multi-container application with Docker Compose
Description:
A multi-container application build with Docker Compose:
* 1 redis container
* 3 Node.js containers
* 1 nginx container
See the following links for details:
* http://anandmanisankar.com/posts/docker-container-nginx-node-redis-example/
* https://github.com/msanand/docker-workflow
